title: 200_liter_tank_full_water_pumping_result
summary: Water tank reached full capacity (200 liters) in ~5 minutes after pumping setup.
description: This data unit documents the 200-liter tank reaching full capacity at 11:43 (Asia/Bangkok). The fill time was approximately 5 minutes for 200 liters. The water source is a well with an approximate depth of 7 meters. This record references the pumping setup and initial water flow captured in data units 00043 and 00044.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
